text: Peter Browngardt is an American animator, storyboard artist, voice actor, writer and producer currently working as such episode The Signal The Amazing World of Gumball. He is perhaps best known for being the creator of Cartoon Network's Uncle Grandpa, in which he also voices the title character, a spin- off of the earlier Secret Mountain Fort Awesome. Browngardt has had prior experience working on shows such as Futurama, The Simpsons, Chowder and The Marvelous Misadventures of Flapjack, The Amazing World of Gumball, Uncle Grandpa. His main contribution to the Adventure Time series is storyboarding and writing The 2009 episode "Regular Show Pilot". title: Peter Browngardt
